tool_description: This API provides news in the financial stock market.
title: Stocks-News

api_list.name: Get Specific Stock News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the latest number of specified results for a specific stock.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/get-latest-news/{stock}/{results}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the latest 4 news from the financial markets space alongside with a link and the time when it was published.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/get-latest-news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
